error.title: Oops, something happened...
error.message: Unfortunately, an unexpected error occurred. Please contact your system administrator copying the following error message:

languageReferences.title: References for: {{ lang }}
languageReferences.description: When importing a vocabulary list, {{ lang }} can be referred to as (case insensitive):

confirmDelete.title: Are you sure?
confirmDelete.message: Please confirm you want to delete the following list:

userDetails.youHaveToBeLoggedIn: You have to be logged in in order to see score records.

manageable.title: That did not work as expected
manageable.message: Something went wrong on processing your request - but don't worry, it's an issue you can fix:

fastWorld.title: We're living in a fast world...
fastWorld.message: Some data you tried to access is not available any more. Most likely, it has been removed in the meantime.

snackbar.endpointUrlSet: Endpoint URL has been set successfully!
snackbar.defaultUrlReset: Endpoint URL has been reset to its default value!
snackbar.passwordUpdated: Your password has been updated successfully!
snackbar.accountDeleted: Goodbye {{ firstName }}! Your account has been deleted successfully!
snackbar.userUpdated: User account has been updated successfully, {{ firstName }}!
snackbar.thanksForImport: "{{ title }}" has been imported successfully. Thanks for your contribution, {{ firstName }}!
snackbar.listDeleted: List "{{ title }}" has been deleted successfully!
snackbar.listNotDeletable: This list is used in a current game and cannot be deleted!

gameResultSecondLine.draw: Let's play again and see who wins
gameResultSecondLine.win: Congratulations! How about another game to give you opponent a chance?
gameResultSecondLine.loss: Don't worry, better luck next time! How about starting another game right now?

general.i18nText: At the moment, this application is only available in English. However, all string resources are extracted and an internationalization service for managing language files has been implemented. I.e. another language could easily be added to this application.

formValidation.pwdNotValid: Requires at least three of: lower, upper, digit, special

registration.title: Registration
registration.subtitle: Create an account and start playing, contributing and learning!
registration.orSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in

login.subtitle: Log in to your Vocabduel account
login.orSignUp: Don't have an account yet? Sign up
login.invalid: Invalid. Please try to log in again.

authTokens.info: If you want to access the API, you can use your auth tokens. But beware of their expiration time. Your access token has to be refreshed every 5 minutes - in this client, this is done automatically.
authTokens.tokenSchemeInfo: In order to access guarded data, you have to append an Authorization header to your requests. Example (cURL):

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.infoText: {{ firstName }}, we would really miss you and want to make sure you know what you are doing. Please confirm deleting your account by entering your username ({{ username }}) and confirming.
deleteAccount.noteVocableLists: If you have imported any lists, we would love to keep your input. However, you can remove them manually before deleting your account if you don't want to share them. All running games will be quit.

loggedOut.intro: Interested in who already signed up? Search for Vocabduel users here...
loggedOut.noScoresInfo: You have to be logged in in order to see user scores. By clicking on a player, you will only be able to see the vocabulary lists contributed by this user.

personSearch.loggedIn: Search for other players here. Select a player in order to get information about vocabulary lists contributed by this user and her/his game scores.

supported.title: Supported languages
supported.info: The following languages are supported by Vocabduel. Click on a language to see how it can be referred to when importing vocabulary.
supported.flagsDisclaimer: The displayed flags might only represent one country the respective language is spoken in.

sets.title: Available vocabulary
sets.none: No vocabulary yet. Be the one to change that by importing a GNU file!
sets.introText: Here's a list of all available vocabulary, structured by languages and units. Click on a list to see its content.
sets.loginToImport: Want to contribute? You have to be logged in to import a list.

import.title: Import a file
import.action: Click here or drop a GNU file

dashboard.hello: Hey {{ firstName }}, it's great to have you here!
dashboard.intro: Have a look at your games, your record and your contributed vocabulary all in one place: your personal dashboard.

contributions.title: Your contributed vocabulary
contributions.message: Here's a list of the vocabulary you imported, structured by languages and units. Click on a list to see its content or delete it.

precondition.atLeast9Vocables: List(s) with at least nine vocables selected
